text:
Question 121) A population is in genetic balance regarding the ABO system, where 25% of individuals belong to group O and 16%, the group A homozygotes. Whereas: P = AI frequency; Q = IB frequency; and r = frequency of i, it is expected to find: group Genotypes Frequencies Iaia and IAI P2 + 2PR IBIB and IBI Q2 + 2qr AB IAIB 2Pq II R2 The percentage of donors compatible for someone in group B should be
A) 11%.
B) 19%.
C) 26%.
D) 36%.
E) 60%.
